about_the_game:
If you are looking for an aggressive close-range damage dealer, then this Soviet medium is for you! The Rugged Mountaineer DLC lets you get a hold of the Object 274a—a hard-hitting medium tank—together with the beautiful Mangut 3D style and 30 days of WoT Premium Account to make your World of Tanks experience even more enjoyable!

Firepower. This is where the Object 274a shines the brightest. The impressive DPM of up to 2,133 HP per minute, coupled with great penetration values, means that you can land powerful shots upon your enemies, piercing their armor and turning their tanks into useless heaps of metal in just a few shots. However, be sure to line up your shots well—the Object 274a can’t be classed as a good sniper, and it takes a while to aim.

Protection. The tank has a welded turret with thick armor on the front, and decent hull armor values, as well as good angling which can help you bounce enemy shells when positioned correctly. On the other hand, the Object 274a doesn’t boast a big HP pool, so you should be careful and avoid getting pinned down or stunned by artillery.

Speed. The Object 274a is neither a fast nor a slow tank—well, isn’t that what they call a medium? It has enough speed to reach a key position early on, but keep in mind that its reverse speed is a bit slower than that of most mediums, meaning that you should be careful when thinking about your retreat options.

Also in the package:

  • Garage slot
  • Crew including a Commander with any zero perk of choice
  • Mangut 3D style
  • 30 days of WoT Premium Account

DLC can be added to your World of Tanks account only once.
You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

package_groups.title: Buy World of Tanks — Rugged Mountaineer Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 4550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Desktop)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX660 (2GB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
